ygData.subject: Re: Hunting at 14..
ygData.msgSnippet: I spent almost 5 levels in lavastorm.  There are mobs there for all levels but it is an extremely dangerous place if you arnt careful.  First of all,
ygData.messageBody:
I spent almost 5 levels in lavastorm. There are mobs there for all levels
but it is an extremely dangerous place if you arnt careful. First of all,
everything there will resist heat blood so you only have 2 DOTs to stack,
second the fire elementals are very aggressive and quite powerful sometimes.
I had yellow cons at level 17 on them. The FEs fire shield will kill your
pet more often than not also. The imps are fairly easy prey around level 15
and the basalisks are doable too but dont solo them. They will stunn you or
cast stone breath on you and then your dead meat. The good thing is its
close to neriak and you can lure from the Najena entrance and can escape
readily by zoning.

Good Luck

Grymspine Mael'fesience
Level 20 Dark Elf Necromancer



>From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Hunting at 14..
>Date: Tue, 06 Jul 1999 16:44:57 -0400
>
>From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
>
>Nope, I'm a level 10 Necro and I was soloing drakes at 9. Even yellow ones.
>I'm
>guessing that they are level 9-12 tops. Elementals are slightly higher in
>level and
>require magical attack.
>
>I'm guessing that the rock basilisks or rock snakes (I forgot their name)
>might be a
>better kill for a level 14.
>
>-Haytred
>

> > From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
